    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78497</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hydrogen cycle: Nuclear fusion of hydrogen-2 and hydrogen-1 nuclei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserstoffschleife: Kernfusion der Kerne 
hydrogen-2 und hydrogen-1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cycle d'hydrogène : Fusion nucléaire des 
noyaux hydrogen-2 et hydrogen-1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciclo do hidrogênio: Fusão nuclear dos 
núcleos hydrogen-2 e hydrogen-1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclo dell'idrogeno: Fusione nucleare dei 
nuclei hydrogen-2 e hydrogen-1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύκλος υδρογόνου: Πυρηνική τήξη των πυρήνων 
υδρογόνο-2 και υδρογόνο-1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciclo del hidrógeno: Fusión nuclear de 
los núcleos hydrogen-2 y hydrogen-1</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of a series of  three steps in the hydrogen or proton-proton cycle, which shows nuclear fusion of a hydrogen-2 or deuterium nucleus and a hydrogen-1 nucleus producing a helium-3 nucleus and a pulse of gamma-radiation.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">deuterium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gamma-radiations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">helium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclear fusion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Protons</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von einer Reihe von drei 
Jobsteps in der Wasserstoff- oder Proton-Protonschleife, die 
Kernfusion eines hydrogen-2 oder Deuteriumkernes und des Kernes 
hydrogen-1 zeigt, einen Kern helium-3 und einen Impuls der 
Gamma-Strahlung produzierend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu d'une série de trois étapes dans 
le cycle d'hydrogène ou de proton-proton, qui montre la fusion 
nucléaire d'un noyau de hydrogen-2 ou de deutérium et d'un noyau 
hydrogen-1 produisant un noyau helium-3 et une impulsion de 
gamma-rayonnement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de uma série de três etapas no ciclo
do hidrogênio ou do proton-proton-proton, que mostra a fusão nuclear
de um núcleo de hydrogen-2 ou de deuterium e de um núcleo hydrogen-1
produzindo um núcleo helium-3 e um pulso da gamma-radiação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di una serie di tre punti nel 
ciclo del protone-protone o dell'idrogeno, che mostra la fusione 
nucleare di un nucleo del deuterio o di hydrogen-2 e di un nucleo 
hydrogen-1 producendo un nucleo helium-3 e un impulso di 
gamma-radiazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη μιας σειράς τριών βημάτων στον κύκλο 
υδρογόνου ή πρωτόνιο-πρωτονίων, ο οποίος εμφανίζει στην 
πυρηνική τήξη τον πυρήνα υδρογόνο-2 ή δευτέριου και υδρογόνο-1 
πυρήνα παράγοντας έναν πυρήνα ήλιο-3 και έναν σφυγμό της 
γάμμα-ακτινοβολίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de una serie de tres pasos de 
progresión en el ciclo del hidrógeno o del proto'n-proto'n, que 
muestra la fusión nuclear de un núcleo de hydrogen-2 o del deuterio 
y de un núcleo hydrogen-1 produciendo un núcleo helium-3 y un pulso 
de la gamma-radiacio'n.</string>
          </description>
